title: The Niners May Be Super. The Cowboys Are…Oof.
text:
I may be terrible at my job. It’s nothing you haven’t already suspected or concluded yourself—but it’s perhaps worse than you thought.

How else can I explain this past Sunday—how, on a weekend in which the brilliant distance runner Eliud Kipchoge thrillingly broke 2 hours over 26.2 miles in a pair of platform Nikes that looked borrowed from Ziggy Stardust, Brigid Kosgei smashed the women’s marathon world record at 2:14:04 in the same foamy sneakers, and known gravity agnostic Simone Biles won her 25th medal at the gymnastics...
description: The Niners look super, the Cowboys ruin Jerry Jones’s birthday and other thoughts from this weekend’s NFL action.
